= Running the setup =

click on the "software" tab and then on the green button "APM setup".

http://megapirate.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/MPconnect2.PNG


Go through the setup, step by step:

http://megapirate.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/setup1.PNG

http://megapirate.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/setup2.PNG

http://megapirate.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/setup3.PNG

You can find in the [http://code.google.com/p/arducopter/wiki/AC2_ModeSwitch ArduCopter2 wiki] a good explanations of the different modes.

http://megapirate.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/setup4.PNG

By cliking on the [http://magnetic-declination.com/ Declination website link] on this tab, you will find your declination. In this example, it's 0'51 east, so enter 0.51 in the field.


http://megapirate.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/setup5.PNG

http://megapirate.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/setup6.PNG

== up to 6 flight modes in your transmitter ==
At the end of the [http://code.google.com/p/arducopter/wiki/AC2_ModeSwitch ArduCopter2 flight modes explanation page], you will find links to tutorial showing you how to make mixing on your transmitter and having the possibility to use up to 6 flight modes.
